installModal.title: Installing a plugin with napari
installModal.visitNapari: To get started with napari, visit <hubLink href='https://napari.org'>napari.org</hubLink>

steps.step1: From the “Plugins” menu within the napari application, select “Install/Uninstall Package(s)...”.
steps.step2: Copy <copyButton /> and paste it where it says “Install by name/url…”.

citations.body: If you use this plugin in your work, please cite it using the following citation. Don’t forget to <hubLink href='https://napari.org/#citing-napari'>cite napari</hubLink> too!
citations.title: How to cite this plugin
